attributes.action: Issue a Full Refund of University Fees for all Students in 2020-2021 Intake
attributes.additional_details: All University students in 2020-2021 year intake should not have to pay the tuition fees.  A full refund should be funded by the government. As students are not receiving a full proactive education at university level, courses are recorded to view but these are not adequate. They should only be paying the equivalent of an open university course.   And therefore, not bearing the immense costs of teaching fees and rents, when most students are being placed in full lockdown scenarios away from home
attributes.background: Government should pay the university teaching fees to enable all students to be credited with a full refund.

rejection.details:
You might like to sign the following petitions:

Government subsidise this year's university tuition fees
https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/552814

Refund ALL University student tuition fees due to lack of quality in education
https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/555516

Reimburse student rents for all accommodation not used during this academic year
https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/560735
